body:
Yeah, all the functions with multiple outputs call it when called with the `out=...` syntax. We don't support rebasing views with non-zero output_nr, which is why we emit calls to `check_output_args` to ensure that none of the output arguments are views.

Eventually, it would be nice to support that, but that's low-priority right now.
